Author: fishonthesun
Text: I have been so stressed after the holidays. Put on 4 pounds, lost it all through eating a relatively good amount and exercising, then went off the deep end at like 800 calories with rigorous exercising and then "binges" that still add up to less than I burn in a day and purging, causing me to retain water and gain "weight" (aka water weight). Trying really hard to get back into more normal eating patterns.  But, we can do it! Just remember to be gentle with yourself. The ED brain is vicious and mean and just try to remember that.  Best of luck to you

Author: Ughleigh
Text: Right there with you,  gained 5lbs during holidays,  just did a couple days fasting and it really helped me get back on track.
